I am an entrepreneur who likes to work with new technologies and investigate the internals of new technologies. I love to dirt my hands to develop software. My current research and development of software in Cloud Security and Identity management technologies. My current workplace is Ericsson Research Finland. Previously i have worked at Helsinki University of Technology and Grammenphone (Telenor). I like to travel and meet with new people.
